GSD.description:
drivers: staging: rtl8192e: Fix deadlock in rtllib_beacons_stop()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 0f69d7d5e918aa43423d86bd17ddb11b1b5e8ada. For more details please see the references link.
